name: Bulkin v. Camp Nockamixon, Inc., Appellant

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
parties: Bulkin v. Camp Nockamixon, Inc., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the able opinion by Flood, J. of the learned court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Ward C. Henry, with him Herbert A. Barton and Swartz, Campbell & Henry, for appellant.
Maurice H. Brown, with him Marshall A. Bernstein and Robert M. Bernstein, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Bulkin v. Camp Nockamixon, Inc., Appellant.
Argued January 12, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
Ward C. Henry, with him Herbert A. Barton and Swartz, Campbell & Henry, for appellant.
Maurice H. Brown, with him Marshall A. Bernstein and Robert M. Bernstein, for appellees.
March 19, 1951:
